thread.section_title: Lovehoney Reviews | Read Customer Service Reviews of www.lovehoney.co.uk
thread.title: Dorothy Gaskell

author: Dorothy Gaskell
title: Dorothy Gaskell
text:
I was very pleased with the delivery of my product and with my product.
I have had one before exactly the same and the button used to switch on and off seems to have stuck or broken so I wasn't very pleased with that.
As I've had it quite some time I didn't have any paper work to return it so that one is wasted.
Other than that it is a very powerful vibrator and one of my favourites.
